/terms-conditions.title: eProcessly
/terms-conditions.description: We provide a web-based platform to enable a collaborative management of contract documents and tasks between stakeholders in real-time.
p: These Terms & Conditions govern your use of our e-contract management platform, website, and related services.By accessing or using the Service, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, please do not use the Service.
To use our platform, you must:
Be at least 18 years old (or the legal age in your region)
Have the legal authority to create, sign, or manage contracts
Comply with all applicable laws and regulations

Our Service allows you to create, upload, edit, and sign contracts electronically. You are solely responsible for the accuracy, legality, and content of any contracts or documents you generate using the platform.
You may not use the Service to:
Violate intellectual property or privacy rights

Your use of the Service is also governed by our Privacy Policy.We take data protection seriously and only store and process contract information necessary to provide the Service. By using our platform, you consent to our collection and use of data as described in the Privacy Policy.

We strive to keep the platform available at all times but cannot guarantee uninterrupted access.The Service may be temporarily unavailable for maintenance, updates, or technical issues.We are not responsible for any loss or inconvenience caused by downtime or errors.
To the maximum extent permitted by law, eProcessly© is not liable for:
Loss, corruption, or unauthorized access to contract data
Any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
Your use of the platform is at your own risk, and the sole remedy for dissatisfaction is to stop using the Service.
We may block access to the Service or remove content if:
You engage in unlawful or harmful behavior
You may stop using the Service at any time.
We may update these Terms periodically. Your continued use of the Service constitutes acceptance of any changes.
These Terms are governed by the laws of the European Union, without regard to conflict of law rules.
Have more questions? Contact us with any questions you may have.

9. International Data TransfersYour data may be stored or processed in different regions depending on our cloud infrastructure. We ensure all transfers comply with applicable data protection laws, using mechanisms such as Standard Contractual Clauses.

p: Welcome to eProcessly©.We are committed to protecting your personal information and ensuring that your data is handled securely and transparently. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you use our e-contract management platform, website, and related services (collectively, the “Service”).
By accessing or using our Service, you agree to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.
We may collect the following personal details when you sign up or interact with the platform:
Billing and payment information (handled securely through third-party processors)
When you upload, create, sign, or share contracts, we store:
Metadata such as timestamps, IP addresses, and document versions
To improve performance and security, we collect analytics such as:
We use cookies to enhance functionality, improve user experience, and analyze usage patterns. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.
Enable contract creation, editing, sharing, and signing
Improve platform functionality and user experience
Send transactional emails (like invitation links or signature requests)
Maintain platform security and prevent fraud
Comply with legal and regulatory obligations
We never sell your personal data or documents to third parties.
Trusted service providers (e.g., cloud storage, payment processors, email systems)
Legal authorities, if required by law
Other users you explicitly invite to collaborate on or sign a contract
We do not share your information with advertisers or unrelated third parties.
You may request permanent deletion of your data or documents at any time.
Have more questions? Contact us with any questions you may have.
